name: progressive-wordpress
description: This plugin adds several performance improvements to your WordPress site. In contrst to other performance Plugins, this one sets focus on HTTP\2 Standards (like Server Push and SPDY). ### minify assets This plugin minifies all CSS and JS Files and caches them. It will **not** merge them into on file. This way you are still able to use conditional assets and if you are using HTTP/2, which I highly recommend, it's not necessary to do so.
author: Nico Martin
